original_title: All of What Follows Is True: The Making of 'Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid'
overview: A retrospective on the 1969 classic "Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid," its impact on the careers of the filmmakers and cast, and how the film made a distinct impact on the Western genre.
title: All of What Follows Is True: The Making of 'Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid'
